text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Bahraini press on Monday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Contract to build new power plant in Bahrain will be signed next month.
- Bahrain Islamic Insurance Company plans to go public. Shares to be listed on Bahrain Stock Exchange.
- Bahrain's banking sector poised to generate billions in extra revenue as new hi-tech era dawns, says senior banker.
- Firemen battle to control blaze at a cooking oil plant in Bahrain.
- A seven-day "wonder of gold" exhibition opens in Bahrain on Monday.
